0.question: How do I order the brands on the front end as it is showcased on the Admin Panel?
0.answer:
In your theme’s functions.php file, add:

add_filter( 'woocommerce_sortable_taxonomies','wt_sort_brands' );
function wt_sort_brands( $sortable ) {
    $sortable[] = 'product_brands';
    return $sortable;
}

The brand thumbnails will then be organized in the same order that they appear in the backend.

1.question: How do I change the slug for brand archives?
1.answer:
Each brand has its own archive, view-able at http://domain.com/product-brands/brand-slug/. The product-brands section of the above URL structure can be adjusted by

Modifying Custom URL Slug Field in settings.

After updating the field. Go to Settings > Permalinks and re-save after adding the above code snippet. This ensures your permalinks are refreshed and ready to go, using the new brand slug.

2.question: Shortcode : Single Product Brand
2.answer:
Single Product Brand [pbf_wc]

Shows a single brand’s image with a link to its archive page. This only works on single product pages, not on posts or other WordPress pages. Note that showing brands on the single page with this short code will only pull 1 brand and not all.

Shortcode Args

  1. Size : Size of the brand image (size="small")
  2. Width : Width of the brand image in px Eg : (width="200px")
  3. Height : of the brand image in px Eg : (height="200px")
  4. class : custom css class for the image Eg : (class="aligncenter")
  5. id : Product ID to get the brands list or leave it empty to auto get current product id Eg : (id="99")
Note : If you want a custom image size then leave size attribute empty
Available Image Sizes [small , medium , large]
Final Shortcode
Shortcode With Custom Product ID : 
[pbf_wc id="99"]
Shortcode With Custom Product ID & Image Size : 
[pbf_wc size="small" id="99"]
Shortcode With Custom Image Size : 
[pbf_wc width="200px" height="200px"]

3.question: Shortcode : Product's List For A Brand
3.answer:
Shows list of products from a brand with a link to its product page.

Shortcode Args

  1. per_page : No Of product per page (per_page="12")
  2. columns : No of products columns (columns="4")
  3. orderby : How to order results (orderby="title")
  4. order : ASC / DESC (order="asc")
  5. brand : Enter Brand Slug (brand="brand1")
  6. operator : Possible values are IN, NOT IN, AND, EXISTS and NOT EXISTS. Default value is IN. Eg : (operator="IN")
Example Shortcode
Shortcode With Single Brand : 
[pbf_wc_products brand="brand1"]
Shortcode With Multiple Brand : 
[pbf_wc_products brand="brand1,brand2"]
Shortcode With Order by last modified date : 
[pbf_wc_products brand="brand1" orderby="modified"]

4.question: Shortcode : Product Brand List
4.answer:
Shows an A-Z index of all brands with links to their archive pages.

Shortcode Args

  1. show_top_links : If set to true then it will show top links like (a-z)
  2. show_empty : If set to false then it will hide letters that has no brands.
  3. show_empty_brands : if set to true then it will display all brands including brands that have no products
Example Shortcode
[pbf_wc_brand_list show_top_links="true" show_empty="true" show_empty_brands="true"]

5.question: Shortcode : Product Brand Thumbnails
5.answer:
Shows a list of all product brand thumbnails with links to their archives..

Shortcode Args

  1. show_empty : if set to true then it will display all brands including brands that have no products
  2. columns : No of products columns (columns="4")
  3. orderby : How to order results (orderby="title")
  4. exclude : Product Brand Ids To exclude (1,2,3)
  5. number : No of brands to show per page (number="2")
  6. fluid_columns : set it to true for full width
Example Shortcode
Shortcode (Show Empty) : 
[pbf_wc_thumbnails show_empty="true"]
Shortcode With Multipe Brands excluded : 
[pbf_wc_thumbnails exclude="1,2,3"]
